actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to establish a Commission of Medical Malpractice Awards.

summary.text: Establishes a Commission on Medical Malpractice Awards for the purpose of studying and making recommendations concerning the feasibility of establishing maximum limits on the amount of damages that may be granted in any medical malpractice suit brought against any physician, dentist, or practitioner of the healing arts. Specifies the membership composition of such commission and its administrative powers.

titles.title: A bill to establish a Commission of Medical Malpractice Awards.
